channel.title: Small problem who is ready to solve it?
channel.description:
guys i did everything i have the ip and everything ready
but i couldnt find good server
most of them are old or leeching
i want a new, full and good one
and i have question i am little bit confused of how to put moderators or administrators
and i am little bit confused of how i bring wepons :)
what codes shall i use ::***
thank you very much

item.title: Small problem who is ready to solve it?
item.dc:creator: @Word_Life Word Life
item.description:
@Word_Life wrote:

but i couldnt find good server - Try either Project Insanity, Project Czar, or DeltaScape.

most of them are old or leeching - Get over it. People do it all the time

i want a new, full and good one As I said, either Project Insanity, Project Czar, or DeltaScape

and i have question i am little bit confused of how to put moderators or administrators [b]To make yourself Owner, or to make other members staff, make sure they are signed out, then go to their Character file, and change the Player Rights to:

1 - Moderator
2 - Administrator
3 - Owner/Co-Owner[/b]

and i am little bit confused of how i bring wepons - What do you mean

what codes shall i use ::*** - In my opinion, only staff should have commands. Such as IPBan, Ban, Unban, etc.

thank you very much - Your welcome?

Read full topic
item.source: Small problem who is ready to solve it?

oh commands

item.title: Small problem who is ready to solve it?
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

Q:but i couldnt find good server
A: search server downloads like PI,delta,dodian,emulous,czar,testscape or cheezescape or whatever you think is good
most of them are old or leeching
A:deal with the leeching i suggest you find a good base i suggested from above
i want a new, full and good one
A:…this question is unclear
and i have question i am little bit confused of how to put moderators or administrators
A:goto the folder called characters
and i am little bit confused of how i bring wepons
A:what do you mean bring weapons do you mean customs?
what codes shall i use ::***
A:???
